holidays.title: National Black Cat Appreciation Day
holidays.description: They’re so sleek and hypnotizing with their all-knowing eyes, but black cats seldom get recognition.

holidays.title: Baby Boomers Recognition Day
holidays.description: Join millions in celebrating the contributions made by boomers in today's society!

holidays.title: Gabon Independence Day
holidays.description: Gabon Independence Day.is an occasion to honor the birth of a sovereign nation.

holidays.title: Indonesia independence day
holidays.description: Indonesia Independence Day celebrates a long battle for the people of Indonesia for their own nation.

holidays.title: National Abel Day
holidays.description: Listen Abels around the world, this is the day to celebrate your lovely name.

holidays.title: National I LOVE My feet Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National I Love My Feet Day and your feet will thank you.

holidays.title: National Marilyn Day
holidays.description: Marilyn is one of the most iconic names in history and today we celebrate it.

holidays.title: National Massachusetts Day
holidays.description: Grab some turkey and cranberries, and hail the wonderful state in your best Boston accent.

holidays.title: National Nonprofit Day
holidays.description: It’s time to celebrate the unsung heroes who fight for those who can’t!

holidays.title: National Thrift Shop Day
holidays.description: Macklemore said it best, "I'm gonna pop some tags, only got twenty dollars in my pocket!"

holidays.title: National Workers’ Comp Adjuster Day
holidays.description: Do your job and demand your compensation, but in just that order.

holidays.title: Slovenians in Prekmurje Incorporated into the Mother Nation Day
holidays.description: Deca ste lüblene slovenske matere (You are children of the beloved Slovene mother).

holidays.title: Joi Wade’s Birthday
holidays.description: This natural hair and lifestyle vlogger is also an outstanding entrepreneur and author!

holidays.title: Joyner Lucas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Stretching the boundaries of creativity in rapping is what Joyner Lucas does best.

holidays.title: Kayla Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this creative YouTuber, the life she wants is one upload away.

holidays.title: Mae West’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was the most controversial actress of her day, famed for her carefree sexual freedom.

holidays.title: Robert De Niro’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legendary Oscar-winning actor is not about to slow down and hang up his acting gloves.

holidays.title: Taissa Farmiga’s Birthday
holidays.description: She evokes anxiety that delights her fans through suspense-filled scenes, making her a true scream queen.
